sentences.en: After the meeting, everyone has to watch the wonderful cultural programs.
sentences.cn: 会后, 大家还一同观看了精彩的文艺节目.

sentences.en: I was elated to see the rapid development of the people's cultural life.
sentences.cn: 看到这精彩的演出,怎能不为这艺术幼芽的成长而感到万分欣喜呢?

sentences.en: It is important to look at the political and cultural context in which the novel was written.
sentences.cn: 要考虑小说创作时的政治和文化背景，这一点很重要。

sentences.en: Man has rapidly been exhausting some of the most easily harnessed forms of cultural energy.
sentences.cn: 人类正在迅速地耗尽某些最易利用的人工能源形式.

sentences.en: Many newly unearthed cultural relics are set forth in the exhibition hall.
sentences.cn: 展览馆里陈列着许多新出土的文物.

sentences.en: Many of our cultural treasures have been plundered by imperialists.
sentences.cn: 我国许多珍贵文物被帝国主义掠走了.

sentences.en: Many unearthed cultural relics are set forth in the exhibition hall.
sentences.cn: 展览馆里陈列着许多出土文物.

sentences.en: Many unearthed cultural relics were exhibited in the museum.
sentences.cn: 博物馆展出许多出土文物.

sentences.en: people who share the same cultural background
sentences.cn: 有着相同文化背景的人

sentences.en: Pruning and training are cultural practices which alter the natural development of the tree.
sentences.cn: 修剪和整形是改变植株自然生长的技术措施.

sentences.en: Roads and other cultural details may be emphasized in colour.
sentences.cn: 道路及其它地物细部还可以用颜色予以突出.

sentences.en: The " Treasure Evaluation " program of CCTV is celebrated for cultural relic appraisal.
sentences.cn: 央视《鉴宝 》 栏目以鉴定文物著称,现代工艺品极少入选.

sentences.en: The cultural relics are displayed in chronological sequence.
the desire to maintain a distinct cultural identity
sentences.cn: 保持独特的文化特征的愿望

sentences.en: The grower can modify his cultural program.
sentences.cn: 生产者可以修改栽培措施.

sentences.en: the very real historical and cultural differences between our two societies
sentences.cn: 我们两个社会之间非常现实的历史和文化差异

sentences.en: These unearthed cultural relics will be exhibited in Boston next month.
sentences.cn: 这些出土文物下月将在波士顿展出.

sentences.en: They exhibited unearthed cultural relics of the Han Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 他们展览了出土的汉代文物.

sentences.en: Unearthed cultural relics was exhibited here last month.
sentences.cn: 上个月在这里展出了出土文物.

words.tran_cn: 有教养的；人工培养的；讲究的
从文化角度，文化意义上；在人文学方面

trans.tran_en: belonging or relating to a particular society and its way of life
